item.title: Evaluate Chatbot Agent by User Simulation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When building a chatbot agent, it’s important to evaluate its performance and user satisfaction. One effective method is user simulation, which involves creating virtual users to interact with the chatbot and assess its responses.
